name: Fsk Language
author: kiro@kirosb.fr
description: Egg Pterodactyl pour le langage FSK

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

apt update
apt install -y git cmake g++ make curl

cd /tmp
git clone https://github.com/KirobotDev/fsk-lang.git fsk-build
cd fsk-build

mkdir build && cd build
cmake ..
make -j$(nproc)

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cp fsk /mnt/server/fsk
chmod +x /mnt/server/fsk

mkdir -p /mnt/server/std
cp -r ../std/* /mnt/server/std/

rm -rf /tmp/fsk-build
echo "FSK installé avec succès"
